appDesc.description: This is a translator that translates questions into English and answers into various languages when you use ChatGPT
appDesc.message: This is a translator that translates questions into English and answers into various languages when you use ChatGPT

You need to log in to use Bing Chat. Press the

include_web_access_detail.message: Improve accuracy by including search results

prompt_genie_disabled.message: Plugins and code interpreters cannot be used with Genie

prompt_genie_right_click.message: Tap the Genie icon on the left to invoke Genie

prompt_genie_toolbar_1.message:
A conflict with WebChatGPT has been detected.
How about using Genie's web search result inclusion feature?
Tap the Genie icon next to the input bar!

prompt_genie_toolbar_3.message: When on, automatically translate typed prompts

prompt_genie_translate.message: Let the prompt genie do the translation for you!

require_function.message: If there's a feature you'd like to see, please request it

share_export_description.message: Select the conversation you want to export as a web page.

share_info.message: The ability to save all or part of a conversation as a webpage

show_web_access_prompt.message: Show prompt with search results appended

translate_language_choose.message: Please select a language to translate

translate_preview_detail.message: Preview the translation results so you can edit them

web_result_word_count.message: The prompt for including search results is 200 characters or less.

webchatgpt_info.message:
When using WebChatGPT, Prompt Genie's,
auto-translate questions doesn't work.
Please use Ctrl Enter to translate the question.
(MacOS users use Cmd + ‚èé)
